Temporal changes in excess morbidity in diarrhea in Japan according to three RCPs are shown in Figure 3 and Table 1. We found that the net difference in excess morbidity in comparison with the period 2010–2019 decreased gradually by the end of the 21st century, and a net reduction in temperature-related excess morbidity due to infectious gastroenteritis ranged from
